dt: {bc}any of a small set of words (such as {it}I{/it}, {it}she{/it}, {it}he{/it}, {it}you{/it}, {it}it{/it}, {it}we{/it}, or {it}they{/it}) in a language that are used as substitutes for nouns or noun phrases and whose referents are named or understood in the context
{bc}the third person {d_link|personal pronouns|personal pronoun} (such as {it}he/him{/it}, {it}she/her{/it}, and {it}they/them{/it}) that a person goes by

dt.t: {ldquo}I'm Jo, my {wi}pronouns{/wi} are she/her.{rdquo} {ldquo}I'm Jade, my {wi}pronouns{/wi} are they/them.{rdquo}
… many people with nonbinary genders use {ldquo}they{rdquo} and {ldquo}their{rdquo} {wi}pronouns{/wi}, although language and gender expression vary widely.

et: Middle English, from Anglo-French, from Latin {it}pronomin-, pronomen{/it}, from {it}pro-{/it} for + {it}nomin-, nomen{/it} name {ma}{mat|pro-|}, {mat|name|}{/ma}
shortdef: any of a small set of words (such as I, she, he, you, it, we, or they) in a language that are used as substitutes for nouns or noun phrases and whose referents are named or understood in the context
the third person personal pronouns (such as he/him, she/her, and they/them) that a person goes by

dt: {bc}a pronoun (such as {it}I, you{/it}, or {it}they{/it}) that expresses a distinction of person

shortdef: a pronoun (such as I, you, or they) that expresses a distinction of person

dt: {bc}a pronoun that derives from a personal pronoun and denotes possession and analogous relationships

shortdef: a pronoun that derives from a personal pronoun and denotes possession and analogous relationships

dt: {bc}a pronoun (such as {it}each other{/it}) used when its referents are predicated to bear the same relationship to one another

shortdef: a pronoun (such as each other) used when its referents are predicated to bear the same relationship to one another

dt: {bc}a pronoun referring to the subject of the sentence, clause, or verbal phrase in which it stands

shortdef: a pronoun referring to the subject of the sentence, clause, or verbal phrase in which it stands; specifically : a personal pronoun compounded with -self

dt: {bc}a pronoun that does not refer to a specific person or thing

shortdef: a pronoun that does not refer to a specific person or thing
